titles.title: An original bill to authorize appropriations for the Federal Election Commission for fiscal year 1995.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Rules. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Ford. With written report No. 103-285.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 469.

bill.summary: 6/16/1994--Introduced. Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to authorize appropriations for the Federal Election Commission.
